page.title: 14MAKING JAM
page.content: {..Activities..Jam Making. Rhubarb & Orange Jam. 2.lbs finely cut rhubarb, 3.lbs sugar, 6 oranges. Juice of 2 lemons. Peel oranges, remove as much of white pith as possible,divide into segments, take out pips,slice pulp into preserving pan;add the rind of half the oranges cut into thin slices,& add to orange pulp. Peel the rhubarb,cut into thin pieces & add to pulp etc.add lemon juice.Add warmed sugar,allow it to dissolve then bring to boiling point;test after 10 mins.When ready pour into warm jars and seal. {Sunday...I usually wake up about 9.30, & lie in bed,listening to my personal stereo or reading a book until about 11.00.When I get up I walk sleepily into the lounge and set up the snooker table.I play about 5-9 frames,potting, escape,safety play & other shots.
